apiConstructor.shortdesc: Do Not call this directly; use GoogleGames.create() or GoogleGames.games to get current instance.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Do Not call this directly; use GoogleGames.create() or GoogleGames.games to get current instance.

apiException.apiDesc: if GoogleGames has already been initialized.

apiReturn.apiDesc: initialized instance of GoogleGames extension interface.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Initializes the GoogleGames Extension. You should check GoogleGames.isSupported() first to ensure the platform is supported (Android.)
GoogleGames is a Singleton and you may have only one instance. After creation, you may access the instance through the static property GoogleGames.games .

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the player ID of the currently authenticated player with Google Play Games services.

apiReturn.apiDesc: the player id of the currently authenticated player with Google Play Games services.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the player ID of the currently authenticated player with Google Play Games services.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the player display name of the currently authenticated player with Google Play Games services.

apiReturn.apiDesc: the player display name of the currently authenticated player with Google Play Games services.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the player display name of the currently authenticated player with Google Play Games services.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Increment progress on the given achievement ID- for achievements of the Incremental type.

apiParam.apiDesc: the id of the incremental type achievement to increment
the number of steps to increment the achievement

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Increment progress on the given achievement ID- for achievements of the Incremental type. Once the achievement has been incremented to its maximum number of steps or higher, the achievement will be automatically unlocked, and any further requests to increment achievement will have no result.
If the request is successful, GoogleGamesEvent.INCREMENT_ACHIEVEMENT_SUCCEEDED will be dispatched; otherwise, GoogleGamesEvent.INCREMENT_ACHIEVEMENT_FAILED will be dispatched.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Determine if the user is currently authenticated with Google Play Games services.

apiReturn.apiDesc: true if the user is currently signed in with Google Play Games services.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Determine if the user is currently authenticated with Google Play Games services. You should check the user is signed in before making requests to the service.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Determine if the current platform supports the extension (Android.)

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Determine if the current platform supports the extension (Android.)

apiOperation.shortdesc: Loads data about the achievements currently available for this game.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Loads data about the achievements currently available for this game.
If successful, GoogleGamesEvent.LOAD_ACHIEVEMENTS_SUCCEEDED will be dispatched, and its achievements property will be populated with a Vector array of GPGAchievement objects.
If the request fails, GoogleGamesEvent.LOAD_ACHIEVEMENTS_FAILED will be dispatched instead.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Load an auth token for the Google Games Client.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Load an auth token for the Google Games Client. Either GoogleGamesEvent.LOAD_AUTH_TOKEN_SUCCEEDED Or GoogleGamesEvent.LOAD_AUTH_TOKEN_FAILED will be dispatched in response.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Load data about the leaderboards available for this game.

apiParam.apiDesc: optional id of the leaderboard to load data for. If not specified, all leaderboards will be loaded

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Load data about the leaderboards available for this game.
If a leaderboardId is specified, data for that particular leaderboard will be loaded; otherwise, all leaderboard data will be loaded.
If successful, GoogleGamesEvent.LOAD_LEADERBOARD_METADATA_SUCCEEDED will be dispatched, and its leaderboards property will be populated with a Vector array of GPGLeaderboard objects.
If the request fails, GoogleGamesEvent.LOAD_LEADERBOARD_METADATA_FAILED will be dispatched instead.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Load the top 25 scores currently posted for the given leaderboardId.

apiException.apiDesc: timeSpan is not one of GPGTimeSpan.ALL_TIME, GPGTimeSpan.DAILY, or GPGTimeSpan.WEEKLY

apiParam.apiDesc: the leaderboardId for which to load scores
the time span of scores to load- GPGTimeSpan.ALL_TIME, GPGTimeSpan.DAILY, or GPGTimeSpan.WEEKLY
if true, the 25 scores surrounding the player's own score will be loaded. Otherwise, the top ranking 25 scores of the category will be loaded
if true, new scores will be pulled from the server even if a cached score table is available

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Load the top 25 scores currently posted for the given leaderboardId.
If successful, GoogleGamesEvent.LOAD_SCORES_SUCCEEDED will be dispatched, and its scores property will be populated with a Vector array of GPGScore objects.
If the request fails, GoogleGamesEvent.LOAD_SCORES_FAILED will be dispatched instead.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Reveals the given achievement, if hidden, to the player.

apiParam.apiDesc: the id of the achievement to reveal

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Reveals the given achievement, if hidden, to the player. If the achievement is already visible, this will have no effect.
If the request is successful, GoogleGamesEvent.REVEAL_ACHIEVEMENT_SUCCEEDED will be dispatched; otherwise, GoogleGamesEvent.REVEAL_ACHIEVEMENT_FAILED will be dispatched.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Shows the achievement view UI to the player.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Shows the achievement view UI to the player. When the player dismisses the view, GoogleGamesEvent.ACHIEVEMENTS_VIEW_DISMISSED will be dispatched.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Shows the Leaderboards view UI to the player.

apiParam.apiDesc: optional id of the leaderboard to display in the view

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Shows the Leaderboards view UI to the player. If a leaderboard ID is specified, then that leaderboard will shown. Otherwise, all leaderboards will be shown.
When the player dismisses the view, GoogleGamesEvent.LEADERBOARD_VIEW_DISMISSED will be dispatched.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Attempts to authenticate the user with Google Play Games services.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Attempts to authenticate the user with Google Play Games services. If successful, GoogleGamesEvent.SIGN_IN_SUCCEEDED will be dispatched. Otherwise, GoogleGamesEvent.SIGN_IN_FAILED will be dispatched.
Once the player is successfully signed in, the extension will attempt to re-establish their connection when the app is sent to the background and resumed again. In these cases, a GoogleGamesEvent.SIGN_IN_SUCCEEDED event may be dispatched again to indicate the resumed connection.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Sign the player out of Google Play Games services.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Sign the player out of Google Play Games services.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Submits the given score to the server for the given leaderboard ID.

apiParam.apiDesc: the leaderboard id for which to submit this score

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Submits the given score to the server for the given leaderboard ID.
If the request is successful, GoogleGamesEvent.SUBMIT_SCORE_SUCCEEDED will be dispatched; otherwise, GoogleGamesEvent.SUBMIT_SCORE_FAILED will be dispatched.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Unlock the achievement ID for the currently signed in player.

apiParam.apiDesc: id of the achievement to unlock

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc:
Unlock the achievement ID for the currently signed in player. If the achievement is currently hidden, it will be revealed.
If the request is successful, GoogleGamesEvent.UNLOCK_ACHIEVEMENT_SUCCEEDED will be dispatched; otherwise, GoogleGamesEvent.UNLOCK_ACHIEVEMENT_FAILED will be dispatched.

apiValue.shortdesc: The current instance of the GoogleGames singelton.

apiException.apiDesc: if GoogleGames.create() was not called before first accessing this property.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The current instance of the GoogleGames singelton. You must call GoogleGames.create() before this property is available.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Create New Google Play Leaderboard Metadata Object

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Create New Google Play Leaderboard Metadata Object

apiValue.shortdesc: The ranking order of scores for this leaderboard; either GPGScoreOrder.SMALLER_IS_BETTER or GPGScoreOrder.ARGER_IS_BETTER

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The ranking order of scores for this leaderboard; either GPGScoreOrder.SMALLER_IS_BETTER or GPGScoreOrder.ARGER_IS_BETTER
